Message.Issue: Because it is a P/Invoke method, 'midiPlayer.mciSendString(string, StringBuilder, int, IntPtr)' should be defined in a class named NativeMethods, SafeNativeMethods, or UnsafeNativeMethods.

To reduce security risk, marshal parameter 'command' as Unicode, by setting DllImport.CharSet to CharSet.Unicode, or by explicitly marshaling the parameter as UnmanagedType.LPWStr. If you need to marshal this string as ANSI or system-dependent, specify MarshalAs explicitly, and set BestFitMapping=false; for added security, also set ThrowOnUnmappableChar=true.

To reduce security risk, marshal parameter 'buffer' as Unicode, by setting DllImport.CharSet to CharSet.Unicode, or by explicitly marshaling the parameter as UnmanagedType.LPWStr. If you need to marshal this string as ANSI or system-dependent, specify MarshalAs explicitly, and set BestFitMapping=false; for added security, also set ThrowOnUnmappableChar=true.

Implement IDisposable on 'track' because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: 'Label', 'CheckBox', 'PictureBox', 'Button', 'TrackOptionsForm', 'AddShowEvent'. If 'track' has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.
Field 'track.bAddEvent' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'Button', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.bAddEvent'.
Field 'track.cbMute' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'CheckBox', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.cbMute'.
Field 'track.cbSolo' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'CheckBox', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.cbSolo'.
Field 'track.frmAddShowEvent' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'AddShowEvent', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.frmAddShowEvent'.
Field 'track.frmOptions' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'TrackOptionsForm', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.frmOptions'.
Field 'track.lbName' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'Label', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.lbName'.
Field 'track.light' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'dmxLight', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.light'.
Field 'track.pbOptions' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'PictureBox', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.pbOptions'.
Field 'track.pTimeLine' is a member of type 'track', which is serializable, but is of type 'Panel', which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to 'track.pTimeLine'.

Rule.Name: Mark all non-serializable fields
Rule.Description: All fields that cannot be serialized directly should have the NonSerializedAttribute. Types that have the SerializableAttribute should not have fields of types that do not have the SerializableAttribute unless the fields are marked with the NonSerializedAttribute.
Rule.Resolution: Field {0} is a member of type {1}, which is serializable, but is of type {2}, which is not serializable. Add the NonSerializedAttribute to {0}.

Rule.Name: Move P/Invokes to NativeMethods class
Rule.Description: This type contains members with the DllImport attribute. Members with the DllImport attribute should be contained in classes named NativeMethods, SafeNativeMethods, or UnsafeNativeMethods.
Rule.Resolution: Because it is a P/Invoke method, {0} should be defined in a class named NativeMethods, SafeNativeMethods, or UnsafeNativeMethods.

Rule.Name: Specify marshaling for P/Invoke string arguments
Rule.Description: When marshaling strings as ANSI (or as Auto on Win9x), some characters may be changed. If best-fit mapping is on, strings that appear different in Unicode will be marshaled to identical ANSI strings, which may lead to incorrect security decisions. Turning best-fit mapping off reduces this risk, as all characters without equivalents are mapped to '?'. Also, note that CharSet.Ansi is the default setting for all string marshaling; Unicode marshaling must be specified explicitly, either as a CharSet setting of DllImport or StructLayout, or as a MarshalAs attribute with a Unicode (or system-dependent) UnmanagedType.
Rule.Resolution: To reduce security risk, marshal parameter {0} as Unicode, by setting DllImport.CharSet to CharSet.Unicode, or by explicitly marshaling the parameter as UnmanagedType.LPWStr. If you need to marshal this string as ANSI or system-dependent, specify MarshalAs explicitly, and set BestFitMapping=false; for added security, also set ThrowOnUnmappableChar=true.

Rule.Name: Types that own disposable fields should be disposable
Rule.Description: Types that declare disposable members should also implement IDisposable. If the type does not own any unmanaged resources, do not implement a finalizer on it.
Rule.Resolution: Implement IDisposable on {0} because it creates members of the following IDisposable types: {1}. If {0} has previously shipped, adding new members that implement IDisposable to this type is considered a breaking change to existing consumers.
